title: The emote contest was kind of crap.
body:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/124706356027457538/472603450484719617/unknown.png

**Disclaimer: I'm not saying the winners' submissions are bad.**

The runners-ups are in the style of actual emotes I could purchase in the store where as the winners just seem like drawings. Is this what happens when you allow the community to vote on things? Probably. 

I also feel like a lot of good entries were overlooked because people voted for meme entries. "Shut up and take my lantern" was top of reddit for example.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
